channel.title: How do i make a ::jail command
channel.description: i want to have a jail area. but im new to coding. so how would i have an area were u cant leave unless ::jail (username) and ::unjail (username). so please be really pacific. i have a mpt server. type thing. please help.

item.title: How do i make a ::jail command
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

This is against the rules but ill make a exception.
Go to client.java and add this:
[code]if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		yell(""+playerName+" have jailed "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }[/code]

Save compile etc.
run, you should be all done…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a ::jail command
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2
item.description:
@sonsofgod2 wrote:

I want a proper ::jail ::unjail command. alright so i found a perfect spot to be jail cuz u cant open doors but u can follow people and get out . how do i make it so you cant tele out of it? i wanna just type ::jail (username) and he goes to spot and i know he cant tele or nothing. if u help ill give u 5 bucks like 5 mins

didnt know offering cash for a thing was against rules my bad

item.title: How do i make a ::jail command
item.dc:creator: @Matt2324 Matt2324
item.description:
@Matt2324 wrote:

Easiest to have a closed building with no door, in a high lvl widly. If u find that just set it as a move player command
And to unjail just set a move player home command with a diff name
